jedupdate.core_body:
This module displays the current date and time.
Module features: - Define Time Zone - Show/Hide analog clock with different shapes - Show/Hide digital clock - Show/Hide current day name - Show/Hide current Time Zone - Show/Hide current Gregorian date - Show/Hide current Solar date - Show/Hide current Lunar date - Clock sources: client & GMT time based on server time - Ability to ordering above options for view ...
